name: Satan's Legacy
description:
Satan's Legacy is a 2D shooter where you play as a demon trying to absorb as much blood as possible to please your obscure lord!

Move around, shoot, buy new weapons, avoid enemies and kill them all! But remember: to be his favourite, sacrifice is required.

**NOTICE**

Due to some issues, the game has no sound in its current state. But fear not! Future updates will eventually fix that!

Our team:

  • Design and Programming:
    •  Gabriele Gentili ("TheGuyota")
  • Design and Art: 
    • Raffaella Di Nardo ("FoffyX")
    • Marco Valerio ("Diam")

Install instructions:

  • For Windows (x64): unpack .zip and run .exe file
